Erick Thohir Minta Proyek Kereta Cepat JKT-BDG Tak Molor
05 Nov 2019, 09:04 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir meminta bahwa proyek Kereta Cepat Jakarta-Bandung tak mengalami keterlambatan dalam pembangunannya. Erick menginginkan agar proyek yang dibangun PT Kereta Cepat Indonesia China (KCIC) ini tak mencontoh proyek MRT dan LRT yang molor."Jangan sampai nanti Kereta Cepat Jakarta-Bandung delay, mengalami hal seperti MRT delay 1 tahun, lalu LRT Jakarta-Bogor juga delay," terang Erick usai menghadiri rapat koordinasi di kantor Kemenko Perekonomian, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Menurut Erick, jika proyek Kereta Cepat JKT-BDG molor, maka proyek Kereta Kencang Jakarta-Surabaya juga bisa molor."Kita coba Kereta Cepat jangan delay karena akan disambung ke Surabaya juga nantinya. Kalau ini delay rakyat Indonesia yang harusnya bisa menjadi tempat percepatan ekonomi di sekitarnya, jadi lama juga," ujarnya.Ia menuturkan, pihaknya telah membentuk satuan tugas atau task force dengan PT KCIC untuk mendukung proyeknya ini. Satuan tugas ini akan dipimpin langsung oleh Dirut KCIC Chandra Dwiputra."Kereta Cepat kita sudah bikin task force kemarin, di mana pimpinannya Dirut Kereta Cepat Pak Chandra langsung," imbuh dia.Menurutnya, satuan tugas Kereta Cepat JKT-BDG ini harus dipimpin oleh kontraktornya, bukan pemerintah. Nantinya, akan ada rapat rutin dua minggu sekali yang membahas isu-isu genting dalam proyek ini."Saya ubah konsepnya di task force selain rapat yang continue per dua minggu, kalau isu-isu urgent. Kalau mengenai financial bisa bulanan. Intinya kita tak lagi hierarki, jadi saya dan Pak Wamen, semua direksi yang hadir tak ada pangkatnya. Jadi pangkat tertinggi pimpinan task force-nya," tutup Erick.Sebagai informasi, Kereta Cepat JKT-BDG ditargetkan beroperasi tahun 2021. Saat ini, PT KCIC tengah membangun depo atau garasi kereta cepat di Rancaekek, Kabupaten Bandung, Jawa Barat. Simak Video "Duh! Erick Thohir Requests JKT-BDG Fast Train Project Not Molor
05 Nov 2019, 09:04 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - SOE Minister Erick Thohir requested that the Jakarta-Bandung Fast Train project not experience delays in its construction. Erick wants that the project developed by PT Indonesia Fast Train Indonesia (KCIC) does not copy the delayed MRT and LRT project. "Don't let the Jakarta-Bandung Fast Train delay, experience things like MRT delay of 1 year, then the Jakarta-Bogor LRT also delay "Erick explained after attending a coordination meeting at the Coordinating Ministry for the Economy, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). According to Erick, if the JKT-BDG Fast Train project was delayed, the Jakarta-Surabaya Fast Train project could also be delayed." "The fast train should not be delayed because it will be connected to Surabaya later too. If this is the delay of the Indonesian people who should be able to become a place of economic acceleration in the vicinity, then it takes too long," he said. this project. This task force will be led directly by KCIC Managing Director Chandra Dwiputra. "Fast Train we have made a task force yesterday, where the chairman is Pak Chandra's Fast Train Managing Director directly," he added. , not the government. Later, there will be regular meetings every two weeks to discuss critical issues in this project. "I am changing the concept in the task force in addition to meetings that continue every two weeks, if issues are urgent. If financial matters can be monthly. The point is we no longer hierarchy, so me and Mr. Deputy Minister, all the directors present had no rank. So the highest rank of task force leader, "concluded Erick. As information, JKT-BDG Fast Train is targeted to operate in 2021. Currently, PT KCIC is building a depot or the fast train garage in Rancaekek, Bandung Regency, West Java. Check out the video "Duh!
